projects.name: Scheme Interpreter
projects.short: An interpreter for a subset of the Scheme language.

projects.name: Ants Vs. SomeBees
projects.short: A tower defense game inspired by PopCap Games' Plants Vs. Zombies.

projects.name: Cats
projects.short: A program that measures typing speed and also implements typing autocorrect. This project is inspired by typeracer.

projects.name: Journalify
projects.short: Created at Cal Hacks 9.0 Hackathon, a tool for you to soundtrack your day based on your journal log.

projects.name: Personal Library
projects.short: An online library containing a personalized selection list of books and movies each user creates by searching about any book or movie.

projects.name: Space Invaders
projects.short: A version of the game Space Invaders in Processing.

projects.name: Four Toppings
projects.short: A virtual boba tea shop game where users experience running their own boba shop by taking orders, selling boba, manging inventory, and more.

projects.name: Guess Who
projects.short: A web application that allows two players to compete in a game of Guess Who.

projects.name: StoryForge
projects.short: A collaborative storytelling and blog web application.
